content: the knit twisted headband is knitted in a tube using double pointed needles or using the magic loop method with a circular needles you can also knit flat and seam together this pattern is knitted entirely on stockinette stitches follow along with the video tutorial https //www designsbyphanessa com/post/knit-twisted-headband-pattern-tutorial pattern details ▶ advanced beginner pattern ▶ sizes adult 21-22 circumference ▶ uses medium 4 worsted weight yarn ▶ size us us9/5 5mm 24 + circular knitting needles or ▶ size us9/5 5mm double pointed needles ▶ tapestry needle ▶ written in u s terms ▶ you may sell the finished items but do not use any of my photos or sell my pattern as your own credit designer and reference back to https //www designsbyphanessa com
